body_html: I also get this race condition. The cluster has Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 and Slurm job scheduler. Using TF 0.12. Creating the directory before submitting the job fixes the problem. But, handling the race condition within FileWriter might be beneficial?
body_text: I also get this race condition. The cluster has Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 and Slurm job scheduler. Using TF 0.12. Creating the directory before submitting the job fixes the problem. But, handling the race condition within FileWriter might be beneficial?
body: I also get this race condition. The cluster has Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 and Slurm job scheduler. Using TF 0.12. Creating the directory before submitting the job fixes the problem. But, handling the race condition within `FileWriter` might be beneficial?
